title: Black Hearts: The Leather Valentine Collection
description: This Valentine's day, take a ride with the Leather Valentine Collection. Eight of your favorite Best Selling MC authors come together to give you a Leather clad Valentines day you won't forget. Bikes, clubs and bad ass brothers claiming the hearts and bodies of the women in their misfit lives.What sinfully sexy way will your favorite MC couple spend Valentine's Day?
author: A.C. Bextor
